text: [Music]
securely sharing files using SFTP is
imperative for many businesses but
running your own servers and
infrastructure can be an operational
hassle AWS transfer for SFTP fixes that
as a fully managed service AWS SFTP
enables the secure transfer of files
into and out of Amazon s3 getting
started is simple since there is no
infrastructure to set up with AWS SFTP
we operate and manage all of the
infrastructure necessary to maintain
high availability and performance AWS
auto scaling means you never have to
worry about keeping up with your end
users data transfer activity and you can
seamlessly migrate your workflows to the
service so nothing changes for your
partners customers or internal teams
whether you're working with large
technical documents media files or
invoices AWS SFTP supports recurring or
occasional data sharing processes
working with common authentication
systems your users always have the
correct secure access to exchange
important files your files are durably
stored in your Amazon s3 bucket enabling
you to use them with your CRM or ERP
applications or process them in your
data Lake with any analytics or machine
learning service to extract business
insights focus on your business and let
AWS take care of your file transfers
with our secure scalable reliable and
fully managed SFTP service get started
today at AWS amazon.com / SFTP
[Music]
